definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Nothing but rabbit tobacco. Pa smokes it in a corn cob .
sentences.chinese: 他把一段玉米棒子挖空，然后装上烟叶。

sentences.english: Women and children hang tobacco to dry in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 女人和孩子把烟叶悬挂起来在太阳下晒干。

sentences.english: Philpott tamped a wad of tobacco into his pipe.
sentences.chinese: 菲尔波特往烟斗里塞了一卷碎烟叶。

sentences.english: Second, analyze the impact of factors that influence organizational structure of Xiangxi tobacco leaf industry .
sentences.chinese: 其次，分析了影响湘西州烟叶产业组织结构的因素。

sentences.english: The tobacco leaf has played an important role for the economic and social development that bestowed favour in the prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 烟叶为恩施州的经济和社会发展发挥了重要作用。

sentences.english: Oriental tobacco is an aromatic leaf.
sentences.chinese: 香料烟是一种芳香型烟叶。

sentences.english: As with flue-curing , the aim of air -curing is the timely removal of moisture from tobacco leaves.
sentences.chinese: 和熏烟目标一样，调制以使水分及时地从烟叶中除去。

sentences.english: The inhibitive effect of dominant microorganisms on leaf mold in tobacco was investigated by method of microbiology.
sentences.chinese: 试验研究了烟叶优势微生物对烟叶霉变的抑制作用。

sentences.english: The inhibitive effect of dominant microorganisms on leaf mold in tobacco was investigated by method of microbiology.
sentences.chinese: 试验研究了烟叶优势微生物对烟叶霉变的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Axillary bud will grow quickly after decapitation during tobacco leaf production.
sentences.chinese: 在烟叶生产中，烟株打顶之后腋芽会迅速发生。

sentences.english: The tobacco leaves are cured in wood smoke.
sentences.chinese: 烟叶是用木柴的烟熏烤加工而成的。

sentences.english: The tax for tobacco for pipes and cigarettes is set at BGN 100 per kg.
sentences.chinese: 斗烟与卷烟用烟叶的税率定为每公斤100列弗。

sentences.english: Xingshan tobacco leaves had rich aroma quality and good sensory evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 烟叶香气质和感官质量较好。

sentences.english: He even learned to chew tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至学会了咀嚼烟叶。

sentences.english: Tobacco bulk curing barn was designed and developed using heat pump principle which can collect thermal in the air.
sentences.chinese: 根据热泵原理设计开发了收集空气中热能的烟叶烤房。

sentences.english: The green-yellow slick leaf got worst quality.
sentences.chinese: 青黄与光滑并存烟叶品质最差。

definition: unprocessed sun-dried tea leaves used to make black or green tea
